main event: An aerial explosion was reported over the Mississippi River near Pilottown on November 18, 1964.
interesting points: The explosion was estimated to occur at an altitude of 30,000 to 35,000 feet., The sighting was reported by the Mississippi Bar Pilot Station and also observed from the SS PolarLacht., No aircraft were reported in the area by Air Traffic Control in New Orleans., The report was filed under Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO sightings., There is insufficient data for a definitive explanation of the event.
witness description: Mississippi Bar Pilot Station, also observed from a vessel.
